projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.details: My personal blog serves as a canvas to paint the vibe of my lifestyle, where I passionately share my hobbies and interests.

projects.name: Dating REST API
projects.details: The Dating API not only facilitates dynamic communication between web and mobile applications but also interacts with the database, effectively bridging the digital gap with technical precision and efficiency.

projects.name: Quiz App
projects.details: The app presents users with 10 random questions, compiling their answers and generates a final score at the end.
